website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list in terms of affordability and practicality. If you simply want comfortable briefs from a trusted brand, choose these.
pros: No-frills briefs that earn praise for outstanding comfort
Cotton blend is soft and doesn't tend to shrink as much as pure cotton
An excellent value with 6 pairs per pack
cons: Some size discrepancies reported: a few customers say they run large, a few say they run small
Material isn't as durable as that of some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed that the waist band is covered in cloth also. I'm starting to get a reaction to latex and my waist is itchy. They wash well, though they do shrink a bit so if you are getting a size you are already a bit tight on, order a larger size. Colors do not run.
customer_reviews.author: brat352

customer_reviews.title: Great for post c-section
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mesh undies that I worn in the hospital after my c-section, however, they only last so long! These undies worked perfectly! They go high enough that I never had to worry about them touching my incision. I am actually still wearing them 4 months later because they are comfy. They may be bigger than some of the jammie shorts I wear, but oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for moms!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for postpartum moms! They are soooo comfortable! They are very high waisted, which is what I was looking for after I had my son, and perfect for after birth. They really help suck in that mom belly!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Too Big!!
customer_reviews.text: They are definately what I call Granny underwear. I ordered a 6 as I usually wear a 7-8. The underwear comes above my belly button, so I washed them hoping for shrinkage. They did shrink a little, so not as big. On a positive note, I can say they are very soft and comfy great for nighttime. I dont think I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rodriguez

I don't like dark colored panties so this set did suit me quite well. They don't fade and they hold their elastic very good. These panties last a good long time. They are comfortable and wash well. I put them in the dryer, too, and have had no problems. These are the underpants for me!

product_meta.title: Fruit of the Loom Women's 6 Pack Beyond Soft Brief Panties
product_meta.description: These Fruit of the Loom Women’s Beyondsoft briefs are a basic must-have! They’re made with a wonderfully soft fabric that feels so great you won’t believe that it’s also durable, shrinks less, and retains color longer. It gets softer wash after wash (just like your favorite t-shirt!) and lays flat against your skin to prevent panty lines. These panties have a woven microfiber waistband, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner. This classic brief silhouette sits just below the belly button and offers full seat coverage. Feel your best knowing these panties were designed with comfort in mind. Stock up on these wardrobe basics with our convenient 6 pack!
feature_bullets: Pre-Shrunk Fabric for a permanent great fit
